text.div:
This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/er-or-observation-room-service defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
1 Emergency RoomIndicates an ER revenue code (0450-0459) is present on a facility claim line for a given claim
2 Observation RoomIndicates an Observation Room revenue code (0762) is present on a facility claim line for a given claim
3 ER and Observation RoomIndicates and ER and Observation Room revenue code (0450-0459, 0762) is present facility claim lines for a given claim

name: ErOrObservationRoomServiceCodeSystem
title: Er Or Observation Room Service Codes
description: Er Or Observation Room Service codes for claims

concept.definition: Indicates an ER revenue code (0450-0459) is present on a facility claim line for a given claim
Indicates an Observation Room revenue code (0762) is present on a facility claim line for a given claim
Indicates and ER and Observation Room revenue code (0450-0459, 0762) is present facility claim lines for a given claim
